name: windows9
description:
Please wear headphones on both ears while playing this. (There are no jumpscares don't worry)

This isn't a virus but it will automatically go fullscreen so if you need to exit just alt f4.

The web version is significantly slower than the native versions.

The original intent was for it to be downloaded by this website https://windows9realverison.wixsite.com/mysite to add to the sketchiness

SPOILER ALERT

It relates to coopertition because you have to cooperate with the antivirus but you have to compete with the virus.

You are open to explore and don't have to run any command that either the virus or antivirus tells you to do at any given time, so you can try finding the easter eggs.
